recipesJson.name: One Prick Two Prick Bad Prick Blue Prick (DIY-Ejuice discord Winner Mixer Showdown 5/26/19)
recipesJson.author: diy_discord
recipesJson.description:
Blue team members: @ID10-T @Millions81 @modivin

 Dr. Seuss wrote silly children's books. But he also cheated on his wife while she was sick and drove her to suicide. He was a stone cold prick.

‚ÄúI am too old and enmeshed in everything you do and are, that I cannot conceive of life without you,‚Äù read her suicide note. ‚ÄúMy going will leave quite a rumor, but you can say I was overworked and overwrought. Your reputation with your friends and fans will not be harmed.‚Äù

We went to that cold dark place, and you can, too. The dark berries, prickly cactus, and ice cold are self-explanatory. The bit of blood orange is there to remind you while you're reading Horton Hears a Who that Dr. Seuss's wife's blood is on his hands.

Come join us on Discord! https://discord.gg/ufVTyAQ

reviews.text: Yeah, should have 4% TPA vanilla swirl üëá
